Summary A globally experienced, multi-skilled, technical and functional Information Systems & Technology professional. Providing quality services in business applications analysis, design, development and implementation in full Systems Development Life Cycle. Familiar with Rapid Application Development and Agile Scrum methodologies. Knowledge, experiences and skills encompasses Data Analysis, Extract Transform Load, Data Warehousing, Business Intelligence, Quality Assurance, Training, Enterprise Resource Planning, Big Data, Data Science and Mobile Analytics.  
 
Industry experience: Manufacturing, Accounting, Finance, Sales, Distribution, Shipping, Insurance, Entertainment, Biotech, Pharmaceutical, Automotive, Energy, Education, Campus Solutions, Airline & Travel and Telecommunications. 
 
Specializations: 
. Hadoop ¨ HDFS ¨ HCatalog ¨ HBase ¨ Hive ¨ HiveQL ¨ Oozie ¨ Datameer ¨ Google BigData BigQuery 
. Data Analysis ¨ Data Warehousing ¨ ETL ¨ Informatica ¨ Talend Open Studio For Data Integration 
. Business Intelligence ¨ Hyperion ¨ Brio ¨ Data Visualization ¨ Tableau ¨ QlikView ¨ Caspio Bridge 
. SAP ECC ¨ NetWeaver Java ¨ QA ¨ Data Quality ¨ Project Management ¨ Training & Instruction
